{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "HMO Business Development Officer",
  "description": "Swift Consulting - We are experts in our fields of work, we use the most modern systems and up-to date knowledge to provide support in all fields particularly in Human Resources, Accounting and Finance, Facility Management, Health Maintenance, Education and Business Management. Our team consists of experts in different professions with a wealth of experience in different sectors both within and outside Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HMO Business Development Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Major Responsibiities


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities to grow the organization&rsquo;s client base.
	Monitor and report on sales performance and provide insights for continuous improvement.
	Develop and implement strategic plans to achieve sales and revenue targets.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with corporate clients, brokers, and other stakeholders.
	Conduct market research to identify trends and competitive opportunities in the health insurance sector.
	Prepare and deliver compelling business proposals and presentations.
	Collaborate with internal teams to ensure excellent customer experience.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or a related field with 2-6 years of experience.
	Prior experience in Health Insurance/Health Maintenance Organization (HMO) is compulsory.
	Proven track record in business development, sales, or client relationship management.
	Excellent organizational and analytical skills.
	Strong negotiation, communication, and presentation skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N250,000 - N400,000 / Month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

HMO Business Development Officer Job at Swift Consulting




        
    

        
        Swift Consulting - We are experts in our fields of work, we use the most modern systems and up-to date knowledge to provide support in all fields particularly in Human Resources, Accounting and Finance, Facility Management, Health Maintenance, Education and Business Management. Our team consists of experts in different professions with a wealth of experience in different sectors both within and outside Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HMO Business Development Officer
Job Location: Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Major Responsibiities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Identify and pursue new business opportunities to grow the organization’s client base.
	Monitor and report on sales performance and provide insights for continuous improvement.
	Develop and implement strategic plans to achieve sales and revenue targets.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with corporate clients, brokers, and other stakeholders.
	Conduct market research to identify trends and competitive opportunities in the health insurance sector.
	Prepare and deliver compelling business proposals and presentations.
	Collaborate with internal teams to ensure excellent customer experience.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or a related field with 2-6 years of experience.
	Prior experience in Health Insurance/Health Maintenance Organization (HMO) is compulsory.
	Proven track record in business development, sales, or client relationship management.
	Excellent organizational and analytical skills.
	Strong negotiation, communication, and presentation skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N250,000 - N400,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at BC Networks West Africa
content:
BC Networks West Africa is into production of Fiber Optic and Data cables. Our products are mostly use for Telecommunication services.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Planning Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Planning Officer is responsible for planning and coordinating production activities to ensure efficient use of resources, timely delivery, and high-quality products.
	This role requires strong analytical and problem-solving skills to optimize production processes and meet customer demands.


Key Responsibilities


	Production Planning: Develop and implement production plans to meet customer demand, ensuring optimal use of resources and minimizing waste.
	Material Planning: Plan and procure raw materials, components, and other necessary resources to support production.
	Scheduling: Create and manage production schedules, ensuring timely delivery and meeting customer deadlines.
	Inventory Management: Monitor inventory levels, track stock movements, and optimize inventory levels to meet production needs.
	Collaboration: Work closely with production, procurement, and logistics teams to ensure smooth production operations.
	Performance Monitoring: Track and analyze production performance, identifying areas for improvement and implementing corrective actions.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in Industrial Engineering, Operations Management, or related field
	Proven experience in production planning or a related role
	Certifications in production planning or supply chain management can be advantageous


Required Skills:


	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Excellent communication and collaboration skills
	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
	Strong organizational and time management skills
	Proficiency in production planning software and tools.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hembafan.gbanger@bcfiber.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Chinese Translator

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key responsibilities include


	Translation: Translate documents, contracts, and other materials between Chinese and English.
	Interpretation: Provide simultaneous or consecutive interpretation services for meetings, conferences, and negotiations.
	Cultural Adaptation: Ensure translations are culturally sensitive and relevant to the target audience.
	Proofreading: Review and edit translations for accuracy, grammar, and consistency.
	Research: Conduct research to ensure accurate translation of specialized terminology and concepts.


Qualifications


	Education: Bachelor's degree in Translation, Linguistics, or a related field.
	Experience: 3 years of proven experience in translation, interpretation, or a related field.
	Certifications: Certifications, such as CATTI (China Accreditation Test for Translators and Interpreters), can be advantageous.


Required Skills:


	Language Proficiency: Fluency in both Chinese and English, with strong written and verbal communication skills.
	Cultural Knowledge: Understanding of cultural nuances and differences between Chinese and English-speaking cultures.
	Translation Software: Proficiency in translation software and tools, such as CAT tools.
	Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy and attention to detail in translation and proofreading.
	Analytical Thinking: Ability to analyze complex texts and convey meaning accurately.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hembafan.gbanger@bcfiber.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Sales Administrator

Job Location: Lagos Free Trade Zone, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Sales Support: Provide administrative assistance to the sales team, including data entry, order processing, and sales record maintenance.
	Customer Service: Respond to customer inquiries, resolve issues, and provide product information.
	Order Management: Process sales orders, ensure accurate documentation, and track order status.
	Sales Reporting: Generate sales reports, analyze sales data, and provide insights to support sales strategies.
	Communication: Coordinate with internal teams, such as logistics and customer service, to ensure seamless order fulfillment.
	Data Management: Maintain accurate and up-to-date sales data, customer information, and sales records.


Requirements


	Education: High school diploma or equivalent; degree in business administration or related field preferred.
	Experience: Previous experience in sales administration or customer service.
	Certifications: Certifications in CRM software or sales administration can be advantageous[1].


Required Skills:


	Communication: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Organization: Strong organizational and time management skills.
	Technical: Proficiency in CRM software, MS Office, and other sales tools.
	Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy in data entry, order processing, and sales record maintenance.
	Analytical: Ability to analyze sales data and provide insights to support sales strategies.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hembafan.gbanger@bcfiber.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
